name: 411 Buy it Now
tag_list: shopping, online-shopping, wall-mount, tv-mount, luggage, cookware, suitcase, electronics, accessories
overview:
An Online Store 411 Buy it Now is an online store that offers a wide variety of products shipped in 24 hours. Our ecommerce got all the advantages of a shopping mall without the inconveniences related to the customer traffic or the difficulty to find a parking. Make your shopping securely at every hour of the day in the comfort of your living room.

Electronics and many more Our online store started in 2007 with mainly TV mounts and electronics accessories. Since that time, not only our electronics department never stop growing, but it’s now a department among others. In the home and garden department you’ll find a multitude of house products, for the kitchen, decoration and many more. We have tools and car accessories, canoes, beauty products, more than 40 000 industrial products and our team of representative are acquiring new line of products each week.

The products and the service You are never alone when you’re shopping at 411 Buy it Now. If you need any help to use our website or if you need information on a product, don’t hesitate to contact our gentle team with our chat online, by email or by phone.

Get points for your purchase When you make a purchase on our website, you get points that are convertible into cash for your next purchase. Collect points and get your favorite product for free. Points can be use to apply a discount on your purchase or to pay it entirely. Consult your account to know how much points you have.

From the warehouse to your house 411 Buy it Now reduce the intermediaries and brings you closer to the distributors. Our many and frequent shipping allow us to offer extremely low rate. The shipping with UPS or Purolator is fast and secure. Some products even have free shipping.

A site secure by SSL Our site is secure by the SSL technology. SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is a cryptographic protocol with double key that secure data transfer. The SSL technology secure your personal information and protect from virtual fraud.

A company from here 411 Buy it Now is a Canadian company working hard to offers an alternative to the online purchase in Canada. The most majority of the online purchase in Canada make Canadian money go out of the country to the US. Enjoy your shopping !
